item.description:
This is the physical follow up of the skype meeting a week earlier.

Please note that the venue has changed for this event. We have decided to try out an other Harvard Square restaurant: The Maharaja (for the sake of old timers: this is the Indian restaurant opened in the place of Bombay palace).

As before, when we were gathering at a yet untested venue, if you don't find us there by 7:15 then we have moved back to our tested venue which is Uno's Chicago Grill this time.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask for the phylosophy meetup group from the staff.
item.name: William James II
